meanings.definition: The act of winding or twisting in a sinuous manner.
meanings.sent1: The sinuation of the river through the valley was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: We followed the sinuation of the path as it curved through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The sinuation of the snake charmer's dance mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent4: The sinuation of the plot kept the readers guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent5: The sinuation of the roller coaster track made the ride thrilling and exciting.

meanings.definition: A sinuous or winding course or path.
meanings.sent1: The hiker navigated the sinuation of the trail with ease.
meanings.sent2: The river's sinuation through the canyon created breathtaking views.
meanings.sent3: The sinuation of the road made it challenging for drivers to anticipate turns.
meanings.sent4: The sinuation of the story's plot kept the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: The sinuation of the vines climbing the wall added a touch of elegance to the garden.
